Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFubenMainMapTab/MainLineActive11A.png'}
{3: 'The scorching bullet casing is ejected out of the barrel and falls to the ground, hitting another casing, and squeakily rolls in a puddle that could have been water or blood.'}
{3: 'This action has been repeated numerous times. Once the gun ejects an empty magazine, the Construct will immediately take out a new one, inspect it, and load it.'}
{3: 'Which fallen teammate did they collect these from...? She could not even remember...'}
{3: 'They are covered in dirt. Some are damaged, while some even have blood on them, with some disgusting bits stuck in the clots.'}
{3: 'However, there is no time for this Construct to wallow in sorrow, all she can do is pray for the bullets in the magazine.'}
{3: 'Hoping that they were not blocked by foreign objects and would not jam the only working rifle she could find.'}
{3: 'This Construct named Liv is currently guarding her commandant beside her with her life. She knows that she cannot afford to fail right now.'}
{3: 'Fire, and fire again. Commandant said they would be all right, so she does not need to think, she only needs to aim and fire.'}

{3: 'No, do not look to the right. Strike Hawk has already headed over, Commandant must be crying tears of joy to be rescued, it would not be a pretty sight, she will have to try to leave Commandant some dignity.'}
{3: 'Another empty magazine hits her foot. She mechanically reaches toward her back, but this time, a Hetero-Creature enters her sight.'}
{3: 'Her fingers grasp at something around her waist, but all she gets are an empty sheath and holster.'}
{3: "Her knife probably was still stabbed on a crazed teammate's thigh, while her gun was given to the injured Commandant before coming over."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: 'I really am not that sharp...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then, it would not hurt to look over once more, right...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFubenMainMapTab/MainLineActive11A.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/UiFubenMainMapTab/MainLineActive11A.png'}
{3: 'A beam of light engulfs the Hetero-Creature and turns it into ashes.'}
{3: 'But because of the angle, the Construct is also affected. She falls face-down to the ground, temporarily losing her mobility.'}
{3: 'The cooling device of the battered Levi-Gun whirls up a storm, white smoke is still coming out of the bright red barrel. She does not know how many shots it can endure.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Go take her place and guard the line of defense.', 3: '40'}
{3: 'The fingers latching onto your hand strengthen their grip, but you already do not have the strength to console her.'}
{3: "You struggle to get up from Liv's arms, leaning against the wall, you revert to a sitting position."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'You immediately taste metal in your mouth as you sit up.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: '(Take out injector)', 3: '50'}
{2: '(Remove cover)', 3: '51'}
{3: 'You swiftly stab the sharp end into your leg.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab'}
{3: 'Feeling more conscious thanks to the medicine, you gently smile at Liv and tap the back of her hand.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I'm fine, I've been through worse.", 3: '57'}
{2: 'They need you.', 3: '58'}
{3: 'Liv grits her teeth as she advances forward. You readjust your slipping body as you see her off.'}
{3: 'From the start of the battle till now, the already weak command system is now a complete mess. If your connection even falters a bit, the line of defense will immediately crumble.'}
{3: 'This battle has already gone against all that was taught in F.O.S. College, like a negative case study on the pages of the textbook, everyone here is going all in on a big gamble.'}
{3: 'There is not enough data to justify their actions and not enough planning. There is not enough reason for them to even continue fighting.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'There is only but a small spark still burning, and through the brutal battlefield, you feel that you can see him there giving his all.'}
{3: 'That is enough, as long as he is still fighting, you will unconditionally trust him, like how he has trust in everyone in Gray Raven.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: '(What are we still waiting for? We should go and help him in the tower!)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "(Ah! I can't stand it anymore!)", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "(We can't stop before Lee comes back!)", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct', 3: "(It's too early to be retreating now!)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Through the connection with the M.I.N.D., you are able to receive the thoughts of others.'}
{3: 'At the same time, the owners of these emotions all flicker like a candle, extinguishing one by one.'}
{3: 'Thanks to that, the load on your consciousness lessens.'}
{3: 'Pain... Anger... Helplessness...'}
{3: 'The chaotic storm of emotions is like a snowball rolling down a hill, it keeps getting bigger.'}
{3: 'But what you can do now is block it off and stop it from rolling further, so that you can maintain a stable connection.'}
{2: 'How much longer...', 3: '95'}
{3: 'No one replies, even Liv who is closest to you has to focus on maintaining the line of defense.'}
{3: 'Which is why it is no surprise when a Hetero-Creature with only half of its body intact crawls toward you, none can make it in time to save you.'}
{3: 'You already gave up your weapons as per your request…'}
{3: 'And that crawling Hetero-Creature is slowly edging closer to you.'}
{3: 'Is it because of its injuries? Or is it planning an ambush?'}
{3: 'Or... maybe it just wants to toy with its prey that is about to die.'}
{3: 'It is as if the Hetero-Creature is part of the colossal tower behind it, bearing its teeth and mocking a frail human with a piercing laugh.'}
{3: 'It supports itself with one hand on the ground and straightens its back. It raises its other hand, even its blood-dripping claws are looking down at you.'}
{2: 'It really is... belittling me.', 3: '107', 4: '(Search for something to use as a weapon)', 5: '107'}
{3: 'Your right hand finally finds a hard object, a stone that was blasted over to your side.'}
{3: 'It is so simple, rough, and crude.'}
{3: 'Compared with the mysterious tower in front of you, it is a joke of an object, doing its best to go against the power of the gods.'}
{3: 'It is meek and weak, a laughing stock to the gods.'}
{3: 'But several million years ago, this is what the ancestors of humans used to start the first fire.'}
{3: 'From then on, they had a weapon against the night, they had the freedom to gaze up at the stars while proudly standing amidst the darkness.'}
{3: 'Wrapping your fingers around the stone, you look up at the vicious Hetero-Creature and the huge tower behind it.'}
{3: 'Taking a deep breath, you redirect all your remaining energy to your right arm...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "The stone becomes the most primitive weapon in the human's hand, fearlessly attacking the gods..."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{3: 'Blinding light engulfs the land, opening up the gateway to the future.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{3: 'Babylonia'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosa', 3: "Ahhh! I'm gonna die! I'm gonna die!", 4: '1'}
{3: "A petite figure curls beneath a table, rapidly swinging the tray in her hands onto the Construct's hard head, creating continuous banging noises."}
{3: 'Suddenly, as if making up her mind, her gaze sharpens and glares at her swinging arms.'}
{3: 'She brings out the hammer hidden behind her and swings it at the haywire Construct who was trying to get her.'}
{3: 'But before the hammer makes contact with its target, the Construct fell to the ground with a thud.'}
{2: 'Rosa', 3: "Ahhh! I'm sorry! I didn't do it on purpose!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosa quickly throws away the hammer and hides back beneath the table.'}
{3: "Only after a few seconds did she stretch out her shaking hands and use the deformed tray to lightly tap the Construct's head."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory264.png'}
{3: 'General Staff Department Door'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wells', 3: "We're out of ammo, who still has magazines?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'General Staff', 3: 'This is the last one, Sir!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Wells abandons his empty pistol. He unstraps his holsters, wraps them around his fists, and gives them a little bump.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Collins', 3: 'Need I shout "start" for you?', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Right after he speaks, he swings his fist at the haywire mechanoid guard's head from a tricky angle."}
{3: 'It was only supposed to buy them some time, who would have thought he would actually be able to defeat it?'}
{1: '1', 3: 'At that moment, a nearby staff member looks like he had seen a ghost. He rubs his eyes before running over shrieking, holding his personal terminal up high.'}
{2: 'General Staff', 3: 'Sir! An emergency report from the surface!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_15.jpg'}
{3: 'It is a glow like nothing before.'}
{3: 'Fear, bizarreness, sorrow, frenzy... All are filtered out of the body under the azure rays.'}
{3: 'The screaming stops as weapons are dropped to the ground.'}
{3: 'The haywire Constructs look around in a daze before falling to the ground one by one.'}
{3: 'The Hetero-Creatures are like fish out of water, their struggles do not last long, and by the time the survivors notice, they have already ceased all struggling forever.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory664.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory664.jpg'}
{3: 'Basking in the glow of the tower, Kamui lets out a sigh of relief and sits down on the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Lee... He succeeded.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No more blinding crimson, no more chaotic disorder.'}
{3: "With the tower as the center, the Punishing Virus is rapidly sucked into a whirlpool and completely destroyed by the tower's light."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Wanshi, status report.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'There are no Hetero-Creatures left, all infected Constructs have also ceased their actions.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It seems that the crisis is averted for now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'We need to investigate more before concluding.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Remaining Task Force members should prioritize rescuing the injured and then retrieve the fallen commandants and Constructs. Do not let your guard down.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I need to discuss the next step with the Gray Raven Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I can't reach the Gray Raven Commandant...", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The four of them rush over at the same time.'}
{3: 'Across the heaps of Hetero-Creature corpses, that familiar figure has already fallen beside the wall of the ruins.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory664.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory664.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Commandant!'}
{3: 'You do not know what the situation is, but you force your eyes open, finally seeing clearly the two Constructs before you.'}
{2: 'Lucia and Liv', 3: 'Commandant!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, please hang on. I'm calling the rescue team over right now...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'You lift your hand, interrupting Liv.'}
{2: "What's the situation...?", 3: '250'}
{3: "How long has it been? Since when have you been on the ground? What's the situation with the Hetero Tower? What about the electromagnetic radiation?"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, the Hetero Tower...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory264.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The Hetero Tower is absorbing the Punishing Virus?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The three men are initially surprised, but their expressions darken not long after.'}
{3: 'A conjugation of this concentration and amount of Punishing Virus?! Is this a sick joke?!'}
{1: '1', 3: 'However, that staff member has guessed what was worrying the leaders and promptly provided an explanation.'}
{2: 'General Staff', 3: "Not absorbing, it's absorbing!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'General Staff', 3: "Wait, no, that doesn't sound right! Let me rephrase...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'General Staff', 3: 'Precisely speaking, it is purifying. The Hetero Tower has become a huge combined Omega Weapon and Inver-Device and is absorbing the Punishing Virus within a certain radius.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory664.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'The concentration of Punishing Virus in the air... is rapidly decreasing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even so, Liv injects you with Serum just in case.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, vitals have stabilized, but please do let us know if you're feeling unwell.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv and Lucia only feel assured after you nod. They slowly lift you up.'}
{3: 'Far away, a commotion starts among the rescue team searching for survivors.'}
{3: 'That is...'}
{3: 'The weak spark that has always been connected with your Mind Beacon suddenly flares like the brightest star in the night sky, calling out to you from across the galaxies.'}
{3: 'Kamui is the first to speak up and starts to rush over without thinking.'}
{3: 'But he immediately stops when he sees you limping your way over.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Commandant, you shouldn't strain yourself! Why don't I carry you over?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'No need...', 3: '288', 4: "I'm not that weak yet.", 5: '288'}
{2: 'You guys go first.', 3: '289'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'All right, then...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'At least let me support you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you, Liv.', 3: '293'}
{3: 'Liv and Lucia slow down and match their pace with yours. Not long after, you spot a familiar figure among the crowd.'}
{3: 'Lee first eyes you from head to toe, and then, with a concerned gaze, looks at Liv. It is not until she nods at him with a smile does he let out a sigh of relief.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why do you always end up in such a state?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I can say the same to you.', 3: '303'}
{3: 'This is his first battle using this new frame and it is already heavily damaged.'}
{3: 'From what you can see, there is not one spot that is intact.'}
{3: 'It must have been a difficult and dangerous situation...'}
{3: 'Those terrifying scars are proof that he never gave up...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm fine, it's just some scratches. I'll be right as rain after maintenance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You guys are the ones who need maintenance more though...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if they had expected this answer from Lee, the others circled him like sharks while he was speaking.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_03.jpg'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'His back is fine other than some scratches from Hetero-Creatures.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'No serious injury on his left arm.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Only an arrow scratch on his left thigh, nothing dangerous.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Right arm, hm... Only some scratches on the surface.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Limb movements are normal, frame temperature is also normal.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I told you guys... I'm fine..."}
{3: 'Lee cannot stand all the attention and eyes you for help.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'I actually agree that you should get inspected first.', 3: '323'}
{2: 'Since you have a habit of acting tough...', 3: '324'}
{2: 'Wait, no, I mean a habit of hiding things in order to not worry your teammates.', 3: '325'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...About that, I will provide you with an extremely detailed report when we get back.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I won't hide anything, whether from Gray Raven, or..."}
{2: 'You better not.', 3: '329'}
{3: 'Lee sighs at the tone of your voice.'}
{2: 'Wait, your front still needs inspection...', 3: '332'}
{3: 'However, when you prepare yourself for Lee\'s usual reply of "not necessary," he actually spreads his arms this time and lets Liv and you freely inspect him for injuries.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Nothing seems wrong...', 3: '335'}
{2: 'Your M.I.N.D. is not overloaded as well.', 3: '336'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It seems so. Asimov will perform a more thorough inspection when we get back to Babylonia.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Never mind that for now, I need to report to Commandant and Babylonia first.'}
{3: 'He furrows his brows as if trying to remember something.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'About... what happened in the tower.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Once we're back safely.", 3: '342'}
{2: "Oh right, before that, there's one more thing.", 3: '343'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "There's more?"}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Lee, welcome back.', 3: '347'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Welcome back, Lee.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Welcome back, Lee!'}
{3: 'Puzzled, surprised, flustered, accepting, and resigned...'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_01.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3201_01.jpg'}
{3: 'Under the warm gaze of everyone, Lee smiles clumsily and genuinely.'}
{3: 'The pain of war and the worry of separation all melt into nothing in an instant, replacing it is the joy of surviving.'}
{3: 'Dawn finally breaks once more after this long night of darkness.'}
{3: 'Even though the price they have to pay is huge, and the path to tomorrow is still covered in thorns—'}
{3: 'Walking on this path feels so grounding and full of hope.'}
{3: 'He did not lose his team nor is he alone, he still possesses so many treasures he wants to protect.'}
{3: 'The footprints of the past will always be behind him, and he will look back from time to time, but he is not lost anymore.'}
{3: 'The past cannot be changed, so we have to seize that determination and venture into the future.'}
{3: 'We will light up the darkness. We will bring new life. We will... step into tomorrow together.'}
{3: 'Just as he had promised, he returned to everyone.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'One Month Later, Babylonia'}
{3: 'If you wonder when was the busiest time for the General Staff since the creation of Eden, then it will no doubt be the month after the Hetero Tower incident.'}
{3: 'Considering that the restoration work of Babylonia is comprehensive, the Parliament has decided to form a temporary department composed of a representative from each department.'}
{3: 'And representing the military is the General Staff.'}

{3: "The redeployment of Task Force members, replacement of damaged transport drones, the production of Construct parts... even the recovery of weapons on the surface are the General Staff's responsibility."}
{3: 'It does not help that General Wells is the deputy director of this department.'}
{3: 'Rather than communicating with the "stingy" director, all the departments like to reach out to Wells, hoping to receive more resources.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Collins', 3: 'General Wells, when will the rest of the β repair parts arrive? A lot of Constructs are waiting for a new pair of legs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: "Sica, please take care of Collins' request.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: 'Of course! This way, please, Sir.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Collins', 3: 'Sica LeBron... I remember you used to command "Apodidae"...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'Looks like the war is in our favor if an excellent commandant from the Task Force such as yourself is helping out here.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Without waiting for Sica to refute, Collins already loses interest in her and takes out a file.'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'E0M2-0022, restocking, a total of ninety β repair parts.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: '...Ninety β repair parts.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "Sigh, I'm getting old, my memory isn't what it used to be.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wells', 3: "Collins, since you're here, why not rest a bit in the meeting room next door?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'Is Nicky there as well?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'I will speak to you two... in private.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Collins dumps the file onto Sica's desk, seemingly losing interest in both of them, and leaves the room."}
{3: 'Wells repositions his glasses as he glances at Sica who is frantically flipping through the file. He takes out a file from the cabinet and leaves.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "Someone's here?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wells', 3: 'Collins. Kurono is probably still busy infighting.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nikola waits for Wells to continue, but the latter does not seem to wish to do so.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'm sure I don't need to remind you again what the duty of the General Staff is.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: "The General Staff is here to help Babylonia respond to all possible threats in advance. Don't worry, I'm not biased on this matter.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Wells spreads out the file he was holding on the table.'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'The Hetero Tower incident has helped decide which plan to go with, we are currently in stage E-14.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'E-14, codename "Genesis"...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Wells', 3: 'It really exceeded our expectations. The situation humanity needs to face did not worsen, rather it has brought us forward to the stage where we can consider rebuilding on the surface.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: "A Hetero Tower that can decrease the concentration of Punishing Virus to zero... The Parliament won't allow the military to take this risk before the Science Council fully understands its mechanisms.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Don't forget, we still haven't confirmed the agent's death, and Ascendant sightings have increased, the threat of the Punishing Virus is just spreading in a different way...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'Which is why we need a base... A city that can represent hope. It will become our outpost for fighting off the infiltration of Ascendants.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Can I interpret that as the General Staff will support us once related plans are put into motion?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: "I've said so before, I will not be biased. This may be the first city where humanity returns to the surface. The General Staff awaits your orders.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nikola reorganizes all the files Wells had presented and prepares to leave.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Right, about last time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The Engineering Force is not happy with you secretly sharing conference notes and front-line status with the lunar base.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'Hmph, your generous speech made me think that you were on my side, Commander Nikola.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's the Parliament we're talking about, it's a place where you need to know the correct things to say. But looking at the outcome, I do agree with your decision.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'll take care of it for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'Thank you, Commander.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nikola does not spare an extra second here and leaves. Only Wells is left in this spacious room.'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'Looking at the outcome, he agrees with me, huh...', 4: '2'}
{3: "He takes out a purple badge from his pocket—a falcon spreading its wings, the sharp edges shining like its owner's past."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'General Staff', 3: 'General.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'General Staff', 3: 'Last week, the Task Force started to formulate a new team, potential members are still under evaluation, but we were wondering if you have any recommendations for the post of the commandant, Sir.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'They want me to appoint the commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'General Staff', 3: 'He says he trusts you, Sir.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'Wells taps on his personal terminal, and a top-secret document appears on the screen.'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: "Ah... So that's how it is. Did the Parliament approve of his suggestion?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: "At this time... I wouldn't put it past them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'Did they read through me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'A special team, codename "Iris Warbler"... Does he think this will become a wedge for "Genesis"?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Knock, knock, knock...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Sica salutes at Wells after the door opens.'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: 'General Wells.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sica', 3: "There's something weird with one of the requests...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'All right, put it on my desk.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Wells curls his index finger and lightly taps on the table as Sica leaves the room.'}
{3: 'He then finally closes the top-secret document on his terminal. Standing up, he turns off the lights in the room and leaves.'}
